# **My NixOS Dotfiles**

A fully reproducible NixOS configuration powered by **Flakes**,  
**Home-Manager**, modular design, and a clean structure.

<br/>

[![Static Badge](https://camo.githubusercontent.)](https://nixos.org)

[**‚Üí Official NixOS Website**](https://nixos.org)

</div>

---

# üß© **Overview**

This repository contains my complete **NixOS system configuration**, including:

- Modular system organization  
- Home-Manager integration  
- Flake-based reproducibility  
- GNOME + NVIDIA configuration  
- Development, gaming, virtualization, and desktop tools  
- Version-controlled dotfiles kept clean and tracked in GitHub

---

# üìÅ **File Tree**

Here is the exact structure of my dotfiles directory:

```txt
~/Documents/Dotfiles/

configuration.nix
flake.lock
flake.nix
hardware-configuration.nix
hipst.nix
LICENSE
README.md
